title: Alvin Ailey Springs Back Into Live Performance
sub_head: The Troupe’s current run at City Center includes two live premieres and four newly staged productions.
body:
New York
The Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater’s current run at City Center (through Sunday) has been billed as a homecoming by the troupe in light of the Covid-19-prompted cancellation of last year’s December season. This stint is pared back to three weeks of programs from four.
